mapper.update: update permission set permissionName = #{permissionName},containAmount = #{containAmount},containCreate = #{containCreate}, containDelete = #{containDelete},containUpdate = #{containUpdate},containRead = #{containRead}, containConfirm = #{containConfirm},containUnConfirm = #{containUnConfirm},containVoid = #{containVoid}, containUnVoid = #{containUnVoid},containPost = #{containPost},containUnPost =#{containUnPost}, containPrint =#{containPrint},containExport = #{containExport} where uuid = #{uuid} and permissionCode = #{permissionCode}
mapper.delete: delete from permission where uuid = #{uuid} and permissioncode = #{permissionCode}
mapper.select: select po.positionCode,po.positionName, permissionCode,permissionName, IF(containAmount = 1, 'Y', 'N') isAmount, IF(containCreate = 1, 'Y', 'N') isCreate, IF(containDelete = 1, 'Y', 'N') isDelete, IF(containUpdate = 1, 'Y', 'N') isUpdate, IF(containRead = 1, 'Y', 'N') isRead, IF(containConfirm = 1, 'Y', 'N') isConfirm, IF(containUnConfirm = 1, 'Y', 'N') isUnConfirm, IF(containVoid = 1, 'Y', 'N') isVoid, IF(containUnVoid = 1, 'Y', 'N') isUnVoid, IF(containPost = 1, 'Y', 'N') isPost, IF(containUnPost = 1, 'Y', 'N') isUnPost, IF(containPrint = 1, 'Y', 'N') isPrint, IF(containExport = 1, 'Y', 'N') isExport from permission pe left join position po on po.uuid = pe.uuid where po.positionCode = #{code} and po.year = #{year}
